    A list of 205 national and international academic meetings in various disciplines for key features of inclusivity and sustainability and propose solutions to make conferences more modern, effective, equitable and intellectually productive for the research community and environmentally sustainable for our planet.

IUSTI-Europe Congress 2019

Year it was held: 2019

Years the conferences has been held: 7

Disciplines: Infectious Diseases & Dermatology

Gender balance/diversity statement: None

Total Attendance Cost (US dollars): $1500-2500

Registration Cost (US dollars): $300-850

Travel Carbon Footprint (tons of CO2) for all conference attendees: 1050

Other Carbon Footprint (tons of CO2) for all conference attendees: 210

Associated Scientific Society/Organization: International Union against Sexually Transmitted Infections

Approx number of Society members (as of 2018): No information available online

Approximate Number of Conference Attendees (Exhibitors included): 700

Geographic Location(s): Tallinn, Estonia

Years held (Every 6 months, Annual, Biannual, Triannual): Annual

Host, Funders and Sponsors: Conference services provided by PCO Conference Expert, Sponsors: Bailleul Laboratories (http://bailleul.com/en/), Cepheid (https://www.cepheid.com/us//), Syn Lab (https://synlab.ee/), Abbott (https://www.abbott.com/), BD(https://www.bd.com/europe/), MSD(http://www.msd.com/),Roche (https://www.roche.com/). ViiV Healthcare(https://viivhealthcare.com/en-gb/), ECDC:European Center for Disease prevention and control (https://www.ecdc.europa.eu/en/home).
